xboxlive_stats_setup.htm+html.head.title: xboxlive_stats_setup.htm+html.body.p:87-3
xboxlive_stats_setup: This function needs to be called before you can use any of the other Xbox Live stat functions, and simply initialises the required libraries on the system. The "user_id" argument is the raw user ID as returned by the function xboxlive_get_user(), while the "service_config" and "title_id" is the unique ID for your game on the Xbox Live Dev Center.

xboxlive_stats_setup.htm+html.head.title: xboxlive_stats_setup.htm+html.body.table.tbody.tr.td:100-9
xboxlive_stats_setup: The ID pointer of the user to check.

xboxlive_stats_setup.htm+html.head.title: xboxlive_stats_setup.htm+html.body.table.tbody.tr.td:104-9
xboxlive_stats_setup: This is the config_id string for the game.

xboxlive_stats_setup.htm+html.head.title: xboxlive_stats_setup.htm+html.body.table.tbody.tr.td:108-9
xboxlive_stats_setup: The unique ID for your game on the Xbox Dev Center.

xboxlive_stats_setup.htm+html.head.title: xboxlive_stats_setup.htm+html.body.p:118-3
xboxlive_stats_setup: The above code initialises the stats system for the given user ID.
